Ranged Weapons

Ranged Weapons allow the hero to attack enemies from a distance, without being adjacent to them.

Categories

  • Bows: Wooden Bow, Elven Bow, Composite Crossbow, Compound Bow, Ruby Bow - Require ammunition
  • Throwing Weapons: Dart, Shuriken, Boomerang, Javelin, Kunai - Single-use or reusable projectiles
  • Special Ranged: Boomerang - Returns after throw, allowing reuse

Known Ranged Weapons

  • Wooden Bow - Basic bow requiring arrows
  • Elven Bow - Improved bow with more durability
  • Compound Bow - Advanced bow with special properties
  • Ruby Bow - Powerful bow with special attributes
  • Dart - Basic throwing weapon
  • Shuriken - Fast throwing weapon
  • Boomerang - Returns after throw
  • Javelin - Heavy throwing weapon
  • Tomahawk - Thrown weapon effective against bleeding enemies

Properties

  • Range: How far the weapon can reach
  • Accuracy: Chance to hit the target
  • Damage: The base damage range of the weapon
  • Durability: How long the weapon lasts before breaking (for reusable weapons)
  • Ammunition: Type and amount of ammunition required (for bows)

Ammunition

  • Arrows - Used by bows
  • Common Arrow - Basic arrow type
  • Fire Arrow - Arrow with fire effect
  • Frost Arrow - Arrow with frost effect
  • Poison Arrow - Arrow with poison effect
  • Paralysis Arrow - Arrow with paralysis effect
  • Health Arrow - Arrow with healing effect
  • Amok Arrow - Arrow with amok effect

Upgrading

  • Ranged weapons can be upgraded with Scrolls of Upgrade
  • Higher upgrade levels can add bonuses to accuracy and damage
  • Upgraded weapons can receive enchantments at +1 or higher

Related Pages

  • Weapon - General weapon mechanics
  • Melee Weapons - Close-combat weapons
  • Enchantments - Magical properties for weapons
  • Equipment - General equipment information
  • Quiver - Item to store arrows
  • Arrows - Ammunition for bows
